content.rendered:
We have won the Deloitte Fast 50 award for the fastest growing company in Central and Eastern Europe, and we are looking for new colleagues to move our project forward with us! Take advantage of the opportunity and become a part of the fast-growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague to join our marketing department. The ideal candidate has experience in digital marketing, an interest in what’s going on in the financial markets, and a perfect command of the English language.

Do you enjoy marketing? Do you think about it day and night? How could texts be improved, what could be done differently in graphics, how to reach the target groups more efficiently, and what could be changed on the landing page? Do you want to work with audiences from all over the world? Then you’re exactly someone we are looking for. 😉

So what awaits you at FTMO?

  • Your goal will be to deliver great results for our campaigns using PPC tools, design and recommend automation strategies and help with campaign optimization
  • You will need to understand data and look for connections in it
  • We will advertise on Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, TikTok, Twitter, Google, Bing
  • You will also be responsible for introducing and developing the brand in new markets
  • Great team of colleagues happy to help you with graphics or advanced automation

What are we expecting from you?

  • Be a pro at Meta Ads (Facebook, Instagram).
  • Know what which metric means and how to work with them to improve it
  • Have an analytical, but also creative mindset (sometimes there are multiple ways to solve a problem)
  • Read and set up ads in Meta Ads Manager
  • Knowledge of Forex trading in particular will be a big advantage for you
  • Excellent knowledge of Czech and English, other languages are an advantage
  • Good organizational skills, and good time management

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 130+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.

Did we catch your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profile and we’ll gladly meet you, regardless whether in person or online.
